message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's in great condition and worth more than you think! Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within $120. Would you consider lowering the price to $105?
Hey Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget.  I'm willing to come down a little to $110.  This is a great deal for a product of this quality.
